Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2012 12:07AM mthrdee wrote: I have now gotten to the point where having complete strangers feel my boobs and talk to me at the same time is a non-issue for me.  When I think back over the way I used to protect these little gems ( ok more like big giant boulders) from the views of perfect strangers.....now....put on a lab coat and boom I strip to the waist and wait for your cold hands to massage the girls. Honest story.....one appointment with a new oncologist and she had just completed a breast exam while continuing a running conversation with me.  She turns back to me and says you can get dressed now and I say......aren't you going to do an exam.  I cannot even explain the look I got from her. So there you go, childhood you are taught not to show your privates to strangers and now at 47 years of age, I don't even notice strangers touching them!!!!
Posts.Title: So, you won the chemo lottery? TRY to find the humor! PlantLover fredntan
